Token.Abstract: Provides the Location Marketing service with information about the locations stored in the device.
Returns the list of locations stored in the device.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of locations stored in the device.

Token.Abstract: Returns the list of locations stored in the device.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of locations stored in the device.

Token.Abstract: Returns the list of locations stored in the device.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of locations stored in the device.

Token.Abstract: @discussion Fetches the complete set of locations from the Location Marketing server and calls the given completion handler.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
Block that will be executed when the fectch is complete. The fetch result paramter can have the following values:
UIBackgroundFetchResultNewData if a successful call to Location Marketing was made. UIBackgroundFetchResultNoData if locations are not out of sync. UIBackgroundFetchResultFailed if there is a problem.

Token.Abstract: Gets a location from the device database.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The identifier of the location to get.
